member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeInvoke.UpdateAll
member.summary: Programmatically starts an update for all items.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeInvoke.UpdateItems
member.summary: Programmatically starts an update for specified items.
member.param: Specifies how an item should be invoked using the enumeration values.
The CLSID of a registered application to be invoked for an update.
The size of pCookie data, in bytes.
A pointer to a private token that identifies an application. The token is passed in the method.

returns.para: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED and E_OUTOFMEMORY, and the following:

listheader.description: The errors occur during a synchronization update.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeInvoke
member.summary: Exposes methods that enable a registered application to invoke the synchronization manager to update items.
